title: New: Dromes – Only One (ft. X Priest X)
content:
Floridian duo, X priest X are causing quite the stir across the inter-web at the moment, particularly with new track Isn’t It So.

Fellow Florida based producer Dromes has given their previous track Samurai the remix treatment and its quite the listen. The bubblegum pop aesthetic has been cast aside, with Madeline Priest’s vocals scattered loosely throughout this thoroughly dark and electronic affair . This stuff feels like Orlando at 2am. Give it a listen below:
